title: Dice Roller

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Target one player each night and roll the dice.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You will target your target with another Mafia role's night ability based on the number you roll from the dice.
- You will use the ability of the Wiki Mafia version of your role.
- The host will roll the dice for you. You will not be notified what role's ability you will perform until you perform it.
- You may not target yourself or any other Mafia members.
- The results for dice rolls are as follows:
1: Consigliere
2: Consort
3: Agent
4: Musician
5: Watcher
6: Bartender

desc:
Post 309
*I LOST THE RUN TO RNG!*
